participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: playful and imaginative, with a hint of sadness due to loneliness.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i am very lonely. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.

participant_2.name: Olivia
participant_2.personality: passionate and socially aware, with a strong commitment to sustainability.
participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i'm a feminist. i have solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet.
